description: '''Thai rock''' ({{langx|th|ไทยร็อก}}) is [[rock music]] from [[Thailand]]. It was heavily influenced by [[American rock|American]] and [[British rock]] bands. Originally emerging in the 1960s, when Thai musicians played cover rock songs for American G.I. soldiers during the [[Vietnam War]] (1960s to 1970s), Thai rock later flourished in the 1980s with bands like [[Asanee–Wasan]], [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]] and [[Micro (Thai band)|Micro]].
